verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying נֶ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh, If a soul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If תֶחֱטָ֤א <S%H2398><s%> te-che-Ta shall sin בִשְׁגָגָה֙ <S%H7684><s%> vish-ga-Gah through ignorance מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol any מִצְוֹ֣ת <S%H4687><s%> mitz-Vot against any of the commandments יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תֵעָשֶׂ֑ינָה <S%H6213><s%> te-'a-Sei-nah; [concerning things] which ought not to be done וְעָשָׂ֕ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Sah and shall do מֵאַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> me-'a-Chat against any מֵהֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2007><s%> me-Hen-nah. of them

אִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> 'im if הַכֹּהֵ֧ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen If the priest הַמָּשִׁ֛יחַ <S%H4899><s%> ham-ma-Shi-ach that is anointed יֶחֱטָ֖א <S%H2398><s%> ye-che-Ta do sin לְאַשְׁמַ֣ת <S%H819><s%> le-'ash-Mat according to the sin הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; of the people וְהִקְרִ֡יב <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-Riv then let him bring עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al as חַטָּאתוֹ֩ <S%H2403><s%> chat-ta-To for his sin אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he חָטָ֜א <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta which he hath sinned פַּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> par bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- afflicted בָּקָ֥ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar bull תָּמִ֛ים <S%H8549><s%> ta-Mim without blemish לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> le-chat-Tat. for a sin offering

וְהֵבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> ve-he-Vi And he shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפָּ֗ר <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par, the bullock אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פֶּ֛תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed of the congregation לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וְסָמַ֤ךְ <S%H5564><s%> ve-sa-Mach and shall lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh head הַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par, upon the bullock's וְשָׁחַ֥ט <S%H7819><s%> ve-sha-Chat and kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפָּ֖ר <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par the bullock לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וְלָקַ֛ח <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-Kach shall take הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen And the priest הַמָּשִׁ֖יחַ <S%H4899><s%> ham-ma-Shi-ach that is anointed מִדַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> mid-Dam blood הַפָּ֑ר <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par; of the bullock's וְהֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> ve-he-Vi and bring אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel it to the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְטָבַ֧ל <S%H2881><s%> ve-ta-Val shall dip הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen And the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶצְבָּע֖וֹ <S%H676><s%> etz-ba-'O his finger בַּדָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> bad-Dam; in the blood וְהִזָּ֨ה <S%H5137><s%> ve-hiz-Zah and sprinkle מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- some הַדָּ֜ם <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam of the blood שֶׁ֤בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' seven פְּעָמִים֙ <S%H6471><s%> pe-'a-Mim times לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei before פָּרֹ֥כֶת <S%H6532><s%> pa-Ro-chet the vail הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh. of the sanctuary

וְנָתַן֩ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan shall put הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen And the priest מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- some הַדָּ֜ם <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam [some] of the blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on קַ֠רְנוֹת <S%H7161><s%> Kar-not upon the horns מִזְבַּ֨ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach of the altar קְטֹ֤רֶת <S%H7004><s%> ke-To-ret incense הַסַּמִּים֙ <S%H5561><s%> has-sam-Mim of sweet לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> be-'O-hel which [is] in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְאֵ֣ת׀ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all דַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> dam all the blood הַפָּ֗ר <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par, of the bullock יִשְׁפֹּךְ֙ <S%H8210><s%> yish-poCh and shall pour אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at יְסוֹד֙ <S%H3247><s%> ye-sOd at the bottom מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach of the altar הָעֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah, of the burnt offering אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach which [is at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חֵ֛לֶב <S%H2459><s%> Che-lev from it all the fat פַּ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> par of the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> ha-chat-Tat for the sin offering יָרִ֣ים <S%H7311><s%> ya-Rim And he shall take off מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu; at אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <S%H2459><s%> ha-Che-lev the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <S%H3680><s%> ham-chas-Seh that covereth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הַקֶּ֔רֶב <S%H7130><s%> hak-Ke-rev, the inwards וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all הַחֵ֔לֶב <S%H2459><s%> ha-Che-lev, and all the fat אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is on הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <S%H7130><s%> hak-Ke-rev. that [is] upon the inwards

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei And the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <S%H3629><s%> hak-ke-la-Yot, kidneys וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <S%H2459><s%> ha-Che-lev and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עֲלֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hen, and אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is on הַכְּסָלִ֑ים <S%H3689><s%> hak-ke-sa-Lim; that [is] upon them which [is] by the flanks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H3508><s%> hai-yo-Te-ret and the caul עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- of הַכָּבֵ֔ד <S%H3516><s%> hak-ka-Ved, above the liver עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- with הַכְּלָי֖וֹת <S%H3629><s%> hak-ke-la-Yot with the kidneys יְסִירֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H5493><s%> ye-si-Ren-nah. it shall he take away

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher it יוּרַ֔ם <S%H7311><s%> yu-Ram, As it was taken off מִשּׁ֖וֹר <S%H7794><s%> mish-Shor from the bullock זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> hash-she-la-Mim; of peace offerings וְהִקְטִירָם֙ <S%H6999><s%> ve-hik-ti-Ram shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, and the priest עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach them upon the altar הָעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah. of the burnt offering

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et ע֤וֹר <S%H5785><s%> or And the skin הַפָּר֙ <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par of the bullock וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all בְּשָׂר֔וֹ <S%H1320><s%> be-sa-Ro, and all his flesh עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- with רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho with his head וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and its כְּרָעָ֑יו <S%H3767><s%> ke-ra-'Av; and with his legs וְקִרְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7130><s%> ve-kir-Bo and his inwards וּפִרְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6569><s%> u-fir-Sho. and his dung

וְהוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-Tzi shall he carry forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- is all הַ֠פָּר <S%H6499><s%> Hap-por Even the whole bullock אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- where מִח֨וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֜ה <S%H4264><s%> lam-ma-cha-Neh the camp אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- where מָק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ma-Kom place טָהוֹר֙ <S%H2889><s%> ta-hOr unto a clean אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- where שֶׁ֣פֶךְ <S%H8211><s%> She-fech are poured out הַדֶּ֔שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> had-De-shen, where the ashes וְשָׂרַ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> ve-sa-Raf and burn אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- where עֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> 'e-Tzim him on the wood בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh; with fire עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- where שֶׁ֥פֶךְ <S%H8211><s%> She-fech are poured out הַדֶּ֖שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> had-De-shen the ashes יִשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <S%H8313><s%> yis-sa-Ref. shall he be burnt פ Peh

וְאִ֨ם <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im now if כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole עֲדַ֤ת <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat And if the whole congregation יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יִשְׁגּ֔וּ <S%H7686><s%> yish-Gu, sin through ignorance וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <S%H5956><s%> ve-ne'-Lam be hid דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var, and the thing מֵעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> me-'ei-Nei from the eyes הַקָּהָ֑ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal; of the assembly וְ֠עָשׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> Ve-'a-su and they have done אַחַ֨ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat [somewhat against] any מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol the whole מִצְוֹ֧ת <S%H4687><s%> mitz-Vot of the commandments יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not תֵעָשֶׂ֖ינָה <S%H6213><s%> te-'a-Sei-nah [concerning things] which should not be done וְאָשֵֽׁמוּ׃ <S%H816><s%> ve-'a-She-mu. and are guilty

וְנֽוֹדְעָה֙ <S%H3045><s%> ve-nod-'Ah against it is known הַֽחַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> ha-chat-Tat, When the sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which חָטְא֖וּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-te-'U which they have sinned עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha; and וְהִקְרִ֨יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-Ri-vu shall offer הַקָּהָ֜ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal then the congregation פַּ֤ר <S%H6499><s%> par bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- afflicted בָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar of the herd לְחַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> le-chat-Tat, for the sin וְהֵבִ֣יאוּ <S%H935><s%> ve-he-Vi-'u and bring אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei him before אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְ֠סָמְכוּ <S%H5564><s%> Ve-sa-me-chu shall lay זִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei And the elders הָעֵדָ֧ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah of the congregation אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh upon the head הַפָּ֖ר <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par of the bullock לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וְשָׁחַ֥ט <S%H7819><s%> ve-sha-Chat shall be killed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפָּ֖ר <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par and the bullock לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וְהֵבִ֛יא <S%H935><s%> ve-he-Vi shall bring הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen And the priest הַמָּשִׁ֖יחַ <S%H4899><s%> ham-ma-Shi-ach that is anointed מִדַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> mid-Dam blood הַפָּ֑ר <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par; of the bullock's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel to the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְלָקַ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-Kach shall take הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen And the priest מִדַּ֤ם <S%H1818><s%> mid-Dam of the blood הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> ha-chat-taT of the sin offering בְּאֶצְבָּע֔וֹ <S%H676><s%> be-'etz-ba-'O, with his finger וְנָתַ֕ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on קַרְנֹ֖ת <S%H7161><s%> kar-Not [it] upon the horns מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach of the altar הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah; of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all דָּמָ֣הּ <S%H1818><s%> da-Mah all the blood יִשְׁפֹּ֔ךְ <S%H8210><s%> yish-Poch, and shall pour out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at יְס֖וֹד <S%H3247><s%> ye-Sod thereof at the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach. of the altar

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חֶלְבָּ֣ה <S%H2459><s%> chel-Bah all the fat יָסִ֗יר <S%H5493><s%> ya-Sir, And he shall take away כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which יוּסַ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> yu-Sar is taken away חֵֽלֶב־ <S%H2459><s%> che-lev- thereof as the fat הַכֶּשֶׂב֮ <S%H3775><s%> hak-ke-Sev of the lamb מִזֶּ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> miz-Ze-vach from the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִים֒ <S%H8002><s%> hash-she-la-Mim of the peace offerings וְהִקְטִ֨יר <S%H6999><s%> ve-hik-Tir shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen and the priest אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-chah, them upon the altar עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al regard אִשֵּׁ֣י <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Shei according to the offerings made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD וְכִפֶּ֨ר <S%H3722><s%> ve-chip-Per shall make an atonement עָלָ֧יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav regard הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen and the priest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- regard חַטָּאת֥וֹ <S%H2403><s%> chat-ta-To for his sin אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which חָטָ֖א <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta that he hath committed וְנִסְלַ֥ח <S%H5545><s%> ve-nis-Lach and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃ lo. פ Peh
